title: Should we initialize the new system for internal spending and approve the first payment log?
body:
Forum post: https://forum.dorg.tech/t/new-system-for-internal-spending/116

This will include:
- Funded Roles
- Purchasing ETH to reimburse gas fees builders paid to execute gnosis safe transactions
- Retroactive Contributions

Monthly totals of these expenses are listed in dOrg's treasury report, in the last two tabs: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AV6ATF1SlFaVHzf2dD7CkHGpT2FafvB7Ss8Yk0opDsk/edit#gid=1717707769
author: 0x152ad2E12E102aBF64280C5e3d70257EFfb0EDe0
